amendment.description: An amendment numbered 56 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to incentive political party committees to prioritize small dollar donations (up to $200) to provide enhanced support for candidates.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Case amendment (A043) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Case amendment (A043) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A043) offered by Mr. Case.
